description:
Kids: Farm Puzzle offers unique fun and relaxing jigsaw puzzles! The game shows you cute pictures of farm animals, which can be divided into different numbers of pieces to make your challenge easier or harder.

Kids: Farm Puzzle features:
- Many unique jigsaw puzzles
- 3 difficulties
- Kids friendly color palette
- Animated reward effects
- Relaxing background music

Start your matching adventure now!
name: Kids: Farm Puzzle
intro: Classic jigsaw puzzles for fun and relaxation!
